titles.title: May we never lose our wonder

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
May we never lose our wonder
May we never lose our wonder
Wide eyed and mystified
May we be just like a child
Staring at the beauty of our King
(Repeat x3)

verse.name: v3

verse.name: v4

Just close your eyes
